Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/productivity/summarize/1885959671010578432/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Bookmark an article with zapier"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/productivity/summarize/1885959671010578432/)_"
---
[TARGETLANGUAGE] 
From the following url [PROMPT]
- extract title
- extract the published date of the article in YYYY-mm-dd
- extract tags or infer tags from the article content
- extract a picture
- extract the url
- Make a summary divided into relevant point, highlight important part and use markdown format
Then create a notion database item with previous result
